attributes.action: India must stop killing Kashmiries & state sponsored terrorism in Pakistan
attributes.additional_details: Why world is watching and where are the international human rights champions. Why India is allowed to carry out state sponsored terrorism in Pakistan to stop Pakistan to not to support Kashmir. India must immediately stop these atrocities and serious human right violations in Kashmir.
attributes.background: The self determination of Kashmir agenda is on the UN's General Assembly since 1948. Thousands of Kashmiries have been brutally killed and human rights have been violated. Most recently more than 100 innocent Kashmiries have been killed and there is Curfew in Jummu and Kashmir since July 2016.

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is similar to the following petition

https://moderate.petition.parliament.uk/admin/petitions/160509

You might want to consider supporting this petition.
